alert.note: Alert for Cabell; Mason; Putnam (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 3:57PM EDT until July 13 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Mason County in western West Virginia... Northeastern Cabell County in central West Virginia... Putnam County in western West Virginia... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 356 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Buffalo, or 13 miles northwest of Winfield, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Nitro, Winfield, Eleanor, Buffalo, Poca, Teays Valley, Cross Lanes, Bancroft, Grimms Landing, Fraziers Bottom and Ashton. This includes Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 40 and 45. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
